content.text: What's up? I'm a 46 year old single dad. My ex cheated on me and left me for a lawyer. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I prefer being inside.
Hello! I'm a construction worker. My dad taught me everything I know. I have 5 cats. I enjoy building houses.
Wow, you're a construction worker? That's so cool! I've always wanted to build my own house.
It's a lot of fun! I love working with my hands and creating something from nothing.
I bet you do! I've always thought it would be really rewarding to build something with your own two hands.
It is! It's a great feeling to see a project you've worked hard on come to life.
I bet it is. I'm kind of jealous now.
You should give it a try! It's not as hard as you think.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about construction.
So, what are your cats like?
They're the best! They're all so different, but they're all so loving and sweet.
I bet they are! I love cats. They're so cute and cuddly.
They are! I don't know what I would do without them.
I know what you mean. I have a cat too, and he's my best friend.
Aww, that's so cute! I love hearing stories about people's pets.
Me too! They're the best listeners.
I know right? They're always there for you, no matter what.
I'm glad we're on the same page about cats.
Me too! They're the best.
